test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryMinus-1
test-case.description: No unary operator is available for xs:string.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryMinus-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `+(-3) eq -3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryMinus-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(-3) eq -3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryMinus-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `(+3) ne -3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryMinus-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `-3 eq -3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryMinus-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `+(-3) eq -3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryMinus-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `-(+3) eq -3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryMinus-8
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `-(3) eq -3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryMinus-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `-(3) eq -3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryMinus-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `---------3 eq -3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryMinus-11
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `+-+-+-+-+-+-+-+3 eq -3`.

test-case.name: K-NumericUnaryMinus-13
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `---3 eq -3`.

test-case.name: K2-NumericUnaryMinus-1
test-case.description: Operand is constructor function for xs:double.

test-case.name: K2-NumericUnaryMinus-2
test-case.description: Operand is constructor function for xs:float.

test-case.name: K2-NumericUnaryMinus-3
test-case.description: Operand is constructor function for xs:decimal.

test-case.name: K2-NumericUnaryMinus-4
test-case.description: Operand is constructor function for xs:integer.

test-case.name: K2-NumericUnaryMinus-6
test-case.description: Cast -0.0 to xs:float.

test-case.name: K2-NumericUnaryMinus-7
test-case.description: Cast -0.0 to xs:double.

test-case.name: K2-NumericUnaryMinus-8
test-case.description: Unary combined with path expressions.

test-case.name: K2-NumericUnaryMinus-9
test-case.description: Unary with an empty sequence.

test-case.name: K2-NumericUnaryMinus-10
test-case.description: A tricky operand, which requires various forms of argument conversion.

test-case.name: op-numeric-unary-minus-1
test-case.description: Check dynamic type of unary plus on argument of union of numeric types and untypedAtomic.
test-case.test: for $x in (1, xs:decimal(2), xs:float(3), xs:double(4), xs:untypedAtomic(5)) return typeswitch (-$x) case xs:integer return "integer" case xs:decimal return "decimal" case xs:float return "float" case xs:double return "double" default return error()

test-case.name: cbcl-numeric-unary-minus-001
test-case.description: Test unary minus with a potential type check error
test-case.test: declare function local:value($number as xs:boolean) { if ($number) then 1 else xs:string('1') }; -(local:value(true()))
